name: getValue
shortDescription: Returns the value of a device variable
description: This method returns a parameter value of the VALUES parameter set.
signatures: Variant getValue(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String parameterName)
Variant getValue(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String parameterName, Boolean requestFromDevice)
Variant getValue(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String parameterName, Boolean requestFromDevice, Boolean asynchronous)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to get the value for.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to get the value for.

parameters.name: parameterName
parameters.description: The name of the variable as defined in the device's XML file.

parameters.name: requestFromDevice
parameters.description: When set to true Homegear tries to read the value from the device instead of returning the cached value. This is not possible for all devices.

parameters.name: requestFromDevice
parameters.description: Only relevant when requestFromDevice is true. When set to true the method returns immediately without waiting for the new value. The new value is sent as an event as soon as it is returned from the device.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the device to get the value for (separated by colon).

returnValue: Returns the value of the parameter. The type of the value is defined in the device's XML file.
